entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dbgshim is broken in .NET 6.0-rc1 Windows X86 #60215
  • Ship runtime using DllImportGenerator #60212
    7.0.0
  • Input SerialPort binary byte value 17 Hex (11) omits the byte and the frame is cut #60209
    Future

Closed

  • Unable to build CLR: error: assigning to 'var_types' from incompatible type 'unsigned char' #60221
  • how to run c# console exe switch to use mono interpreter runtime? #60213
  • CancellationTokenSource is hard to use correctly #29970
    Future
  • Remove Net5CompatFileStreamStrategy in .NET 7 early previews #55196
    7.0.0
  • Directory.GetFiles is very slow on linux with NFS share #59947
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DeleteOnClose.OpenOrCreate_DeleteOnClose_UsableAsMutex #60210
  • User's secrets are not used in the new templates in Net 6 RC1 #59745
    6.0.0
  • On Linux, FileShare.None doesn't seem to be taken into account when retrying to open a locked file #59995
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60224
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Improve node stats reporting #60223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize redundant memory barriers on arm/arm64 #60219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure attributes are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Backport of changes to support x64 on arm64 #60208
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Fix GetGenerationWithRange when we have a gen 2 object in the ephemeral segment (#60189) #60207
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix a build break #60222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ISMETHOD and ISMETHODHASH macros #59993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updates to DllImportGenerator docs #60211
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove `Net5CompatFileStreamStrategy`. #57735
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Regression Fix - Update HostFactoryResolver, set the app name via an argument #60132
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting

Updated

  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60205
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [reflection] Return n2m wrapper from RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer #60200
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Add C# multi-dimension array versions of the Benchstones tests #60192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve IndexOfAny(byte,byte,byte) #40894
    area-System.Memory, needs more info, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Process cancelled tasks from SerialStream.Unix read/write request queues when a timeout occurs #55188
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update docs for PipeReader.TryRead #52237
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • EnvironmentVariables config add missing prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ #57546
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add tests exposing issue #60035 #60047

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • After upgrade from net6 preview 7 to rc1, build project which is created with net6 preview 7 with error "C:\Users\v-danche\RC1\before\myconsole\Program.cs(2,1): error CS0103: The name 'Console' does not exist in the current context [C:\Users\v-danche\RC1\before\myconsole\myconsole.csproj]" #20509

Updated

  • windows arm64 dotnet SDK fails to publish self-contained #20840
    Discussion
  • Freestyle Jenkins msBuild command #21893

PullRequests

Created

  • Use TFM in dotnet.*.js file name #21919
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21885
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert.NotNull and .Should().NotBeNull() aren't treated as a null reference check (Incorrect warning: "CS8602: Dereference of a possibly null reference.") #57067
  • Removal of a unnecessary cast causes 'unintended reference comparison' warning. #57065
  • NRT issue in new cast simplifier #57064
  • Cast removal issue with new cast simplifier #57063

Closed

  • Disable redirect when pausing running project #56648
    Backlog
  • Fixing namespace should not move to top of the file. #56773
    Backlog
  • Cast simplification bug with constant patterns. #57062
  • IDE0004 being reported on casting nint* to nint via void* #56207
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 false positive for overload by parameter type #55621
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 - Remove Unnecessary Cast - Invalid suggestion to remove cast that's necessary #53698
    Backlog
  • Remove unnecessary cast changes overload resolution #52524
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add tests #57066
    Area-IDE
  • Run 'remove unnecessary cast' on Workspaces layer. #57061
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add control tower flag for disabling the project cache service. #57060
    Area-IDE
  • Completion options3 #57058
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57056
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove branch-checking from storage subsystem #57059
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Reimplement the logic for remove-unnecessary-cast. #56932
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not pass out a pooled array builder to the editor in lightbulbs #57045
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57057
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Separate global and solution completion options #57033
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add a remote-control flag to allow us to effectively disable branch-ids #57034
    Area-IDE
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: add more tests and fix nullability analysis #53822
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetEndpointAttribute<T> in EndpointHttpContextExtensions.cs #37425
  • Startup regression: endpoint #37424
  • '400 Bad Request' when connect some domains that contains '-' #37421
  • IIS ApplicationInitialization tests are not running on helix #37419

Closed

  • Chrome Mobile 91 may result in WebAssembly load error #33559
    Discussions
  • Discussion about [aspnet/Announcements] Disable Long Polling Fallback Transport for Blazor Server #34754
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: mapaction, single_query #37363
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #37402
  • Can't run Blazor WASM in WSL launch profile #37393
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #37379
  • Perf regression: plaintext_actix, updates #36962
  • Using virtualization under table display incorrect in firefox #35171
    Discussions
  • Suggestion: Use Razor template engine outside of MVC #37282

PullRequests

Created

  • Set the `aria-invalid` attribute to "true" instead of true. #37423
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #37340 #37417
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fixes #37340 #37416
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix MSBuild property name for MicrosoftBuildTasksCoreVersion #37411
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Value Converter not working in Update when the field is not changed (Cosmos DB) #26299
  • SqliteCommand.GetStatements unnecessarily gets parameter count for prepared statement #26298
  • SqliteCommand allocates byte array per every query or prepare #26296
  • SqliteCommand allocates one Stopwatch per every query or prepare #26295
  • SqliteCommand._preparedStatements list initialized with 0 capacity #26294
  • .NET Json handle self reference inaccurary when eager loading with DTO model #26293

Closed

  • Temporal history table name always based on entity type name, not table name #26271
    6.0.0
  • Make value converting nulls internal for 6.0 #26230
    6.0.0
  • Using postgre database, paging query performance issues #26282

PullRequests

Created

  • Full coverage for CSharpSnapshotGenerator #26297
  • Cosmos: remove automatic composition of discriminator filter in raw SQL queries #26292
  • Cache Eventargs in SQLiteConnection #26291
    community-contribution

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26289
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Mark internal the ValueConverter constructors that allow conversion of nulls #26232
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0] Fix to #26271 - Temporal history table name always based on entity type name, not table name #26281
    Servicing-consider

Updated

  • fix : ensuring annotation white space. #26262
    blocked
  • Make Projection_AsEnumerable_projection deterministic #26285
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 7.5.8 to 8.0.3 #26246
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
